titleStmt.title: The case of the King and publick. With Joseph Bruxby's petition, and proceedings with the Lord of the Treasury, and the commissioners of the excise, in the years 93 and 95. or a short breviate thereof. Most humbly offered to the consideration of the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
